entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
